GSD.description:
ext4: fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.8 by commit 14aa3f49c7fc6424763f4323bfbc3a807b0727dc. For more details please see the references link.
